cavestone.advancements.quests.root.title: Starting a new adventure
cavestone.advancements.quests.root.desc: Mine your first cobblestone out of an infinite world full of stone
cavestone.advancements.quests.locate_cav: Find a cave where water can be found, and sometimes treasures are hidden
cavestone.advancements.quests.locate_rui: I wonder if the nether is better
cavestone.advancements.quests.enter_neth: Deep in the nether, nothing is better
cavestone.advancements.quests.locate_str: Yes, strongholds generate in this world
